alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:24PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sunflower and northeastern Bolivar Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 524 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mound Bayou, or near Shelby, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rome around 550 PM CDT. Parchman around 555 PM CDT. Drew around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Winstonville and Duncan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northwestern Mississippi.
